document_data.name: Sunil al-Sahil
document_data.mainbody: '''Sunil al-Sahil''' was a [[Tasked genie|tasked]] [[administrator genie]] who inhabited [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Golden Huzuz|29}}
document_data.Personality: Sunil was prized by the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] for her devotion to duty.
document_data.Activities: Sunil represented the throne of Huzuz for the three major bureaucratic centers of power within in city. Bureaucrats from the [[Northwest District]], [[Affluent District]], and [[Central District]] all answered to her.
document_data.Relationships: Sunil was the sister of [[Sandara al-Sahil]].
